        text run at (2,0) width 180 RTL: "\x{5D8}\x{5E7}\x{5E1}\x{5D8} \x{5D6}\x{5D4} \x{5E6}\x{5E8}\x{5D9}\x{5DA} \x{5DC}\x{5D4}\x{5D9}\x{5D5}\x{5EA} \x{5DE}\x{5D9}\x{5D5}\x{5E9}\x{5E8} \x{5DC}\x{5E9}\x{5DE}\x{5D0}\x{5DC}"
    LayoutBlockFlow {OPTION} at (16,35) size 184x17
      LayoutText {#text} at (56,0) size 72x16
        text run at (56,0) width 72 RTL: "\x{5D8}\x{5E7}\x{5E1}\x{5D8} \x{5DE}\x{5DE}\x{5D5}\x{5E8}\x{5DB}\x{5D6}"
layer at (582,492) size 201x70 clip at (583,493) size 184x68
  LayoutListBox {SELECT} at (1,1) size 201x70 [bgcolor=#FFFFFF] [border: (1px solid #A9A9A9)]
    LayoutBlockFlow {OPTION} at (1,1) size 184x17
      LayoutText {#text} at (2,0) size 180x16
        text run at (2,0) width 180 RTL: "\x{5D8}\x{5E7}\x{5E1}\x{5D8} \x{5D6}\x{5D4} \x{5E6}\x{5E8}\x{5D9}\x{5DA} \x{5DC}\x{5D4}\x{5D9}\x{5D5}\x{5EA} \x{5DE}\x{5D9}\x{5D5}\x{5E9}\x{5E8} \x{5DC}\x{5E9}\x{5DE}\x{5D0}\x{5DC}"
